title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-11.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 363-11.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Subpart applies to reclamation activities at
landfills regulated pursuant to this Part. For purposes of this Subpart, 'landfill reclamation' is defined as excavation of a portion or all of a
landfill with the goal of reducing landfill volume through separation of
materials into recyclable, reusable, and combustible components; reducing
closure and post-closure costs by complete or partial removal of the landfill; creating capacity; or reducing environmental impacts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
363-11.1

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
